title: Finite Elements
creator_credit: Atlas Computer Company and Royal College of Art (Great Britain)
brief_description: The training of engineering students in the technique of finite elements analysis has frequently presented certain difficulties. This film effectively shows the basis of the mathematical theory of the finite element method and then demonstrates its application to practical engineering problems.
